GeneralOptions.ClearSelection: Clear the current selection while selecting new files
GeneralOptions.ExportOnlySelected: Export only the items that are selected to Purge
GeneralOptions.SkipFilesPurged: Skip the files that already Purged
GeneralOptions.CreateListofXrefs: Create a List of all the Xrefs for Purging later.
GeneralOptions.AuditDatabase: Audit the Database to fix the errors

BatchInfoTexts.Info2: Purge Cancelled, Click Purge to Continue
BatchInfoTexts.Info9: Please check the path you entered
BatchInfoTexts.Info21: Purge Cancelled, Some items may not be Purged
BatchInfoTexts.Info36: File not found at this path
BatchInfoTexts.Info37: Please use the 'About' tab to change the settings folder
BatchInfoTexts.Info39: Invalid characters found in the Suffix text!! These characters are not allowed
BatchInfoTexts.Info45: Not Scanned,'Never Purge Xref' option is selected
BatchInfoTexts.Info47: DGN data not found in the Xrefs
BatchInfoTexts.Info56: Language changed,run the command again to see the changes
BatchInfoTexts.Info65: Invalid Drawing file, try to AUDIT the drawing
BatchInfoTexts.Info67: Xrefs found in this drawing Would you like to scan and purge the Xref's DGN data also ?
BatchInfoTexts.Info70: Loading the required AEC Files..[This is a one time process]
BatchInfoTexts.Info71: Audit is only available from AutoCAD 2015 version
BatchInfoTexts.Info72: Reload Xrefs to Update the Drawing
BatchInfoTexts.Info76: Please select a folder to Backup the files Replace option requires a backup location to backup the drawings

btnSelectFolder.tooltip: Click to add files from a folder

btnSuccessColor.tooltip: Click to select the Color for Purged items

btnFailedColor.tooltip: Click to select the Color for Failed items

btnResetColor.tooltip: Click to Reset the Colors to Default

btnStngFile.tooltip: Click to change the Settings file location

btnSaveFolder.tooltip: Click to select the folder to save

btnBackupFolder.tooltip: Click to select the Backup location

btnSearchFolder.tooltip: Search the folder path in the text window on left

btnShowPurgeInfo.tooltip: Click to Show the Purge Results

btnRemoveAll.tooltip: Delete all the files selected for purge

btnAddXrefs.tooltip: Click to add the xrefs to purge list

rdXrefPromptPurge.tooltip: Ask me before Scanning for Xref Purge

rdDGNFoundStatusBar.tooltip: Show the DGN data count at status bar

rdDGNFoundInfoCenter.tooltip: Show the DGN data count at Info Center

rdDGNFoundCommandLine.tooltip: Show the DGN data count at command line

chkShowProgressInWindow.text: Show the Purge Progress in a new window
chkShowProgressInWindow.tooltip: Select to Show the Purge progress in a new window

chkShowProgressInStatus.text: Show Purge Progress in Status bar
chkShowProgressInStatus.tooltip: Select to Show the Purge progress in AutoCAD status bar

chkShowTextWindow.text: Show AutoCAD text window after Purge
chkShowTextWindow.tooltip: Show the text window upon completion of Purge

chkShowDwgPurgeRsltsSlctd.text: Display the results of selected items only
chkShowDwgPurgeRsltsSlctd.tooltip: Show the selected items results after Purging

chkScanforDGNonStart.text: Scan for DGN data while opening a drawing
chkScanforDGNonStart.tooltip: Select to Scan drawing for DGN data while it opening

chkApplyExtraTools.tooltip: Select to enable the Additional Tools

chkChangeSpace.tooltip: Select to change the space to Model/Paper

chkChangeUnits.tooltip: Select to Change the Drawing Units

chkLayer.tooltip: Select to Change the Current Layer to 0

chkChangeSysVar.tooltip: Select to Change the below listed variables

chkDisableBackup.text: Backup the files automatically while using 'Replace/Overwrite' option

chkIndexCtl.tooltip: Select to ignore the INDEXCTL error

chkDeleteFiles.tooltip: Delete other files, such as bak,err,plot.log etc

txtbxSearchPath.tooltip: Copy and Paste a folder path and press Enter

lblAddXrefs.text: Note:The current purge file list will be cleared when adding xrefs
lblAddXrefs.tooltip: Only valid xrefs will be added

lblStngFile.tooltip: Click to open the Settings file location

lblWarning.text: Warning: Automatic Backup is disabled, to enable visit 'About' tab
lblWarning.tooltip: It is recommended to enable the backup or do a manual backup

grpScanDGNMsg.text: If any DGN data found, Where you want to see the message ?
